mapper.insert: insert into ljy_user_info (userId, username, userIcon, vip, rudder, guide, attention, fans, honey, address, city, gender, introduction, birthDate, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy ) values (#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usericon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rudder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guide,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attention,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fans,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{honey,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update ljy_user_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userIcon = #{usericon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip = #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rudder = #{rudder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, guide = #{guide,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attention = #{attention,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fans = #{fans,jdbcType=BIGINT}, honey = #{honey,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDate = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select userId, username, userIcon, vip, rudder, guide, attention, fans, honey, address, city, gender, introduction, birthDate, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from ljy_user_info where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
